articles.title: The wedding tech now at the heart of couples' nuptials - BBC
articles.description: A growing number of brides and grooms are embracing technology for their big day.
articles.content:
Instead of traditional gold bands, Czech couple Jiri and Ondrej Vedral exchanged smart rings on their wedding day.
Smart rings are wearable electronic devices with functions similar to smartwatches.… [+6107 chars]
